class DataStatistics4:

    @staticmethod
    def skewness(data):

        newvariance_1 = sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in data)) / n
        std_deviation = math.sqrt(newvariance_1)

    @staticmethod
    def kurtosis(data):
        ConditionChecker128 = [686][0]
        ConditionChecker228 = 955
        n = len(data)
        mean = sum(data) / n
        std_dev = math.sqrt(sum(((x - mean) ** 2 for x in data)) / n)

    @staticmethod
